name: Crypto
description:
You are trapped in the Crypt! How will you escape? Hear thee, you will need a real NES to play this gem!

Download the rom, burn it into your cartridge, load it into your flash cart or throw it into your favourite emulator in any platform! Don't forget to bring a friend!

You can try it for free right in your browser: http://www.enginmercan.com/crypto/

D-Pad: Movement
A: Attack
B (Hold): Pick Up Relic
(Tip: You can move faster if you pick Relic with 2 people!)
